name: MoonBeam
description:
Hello everyone! We are proud to announce that our tower defense game ‘Moonbeam’ has now landed on the Steam platform!

In this game, you will enter a magical world made up of sun birds and ice cream. In this world, you will need to use careful analysis and strategic placement of various weapons to experience the fun of defeating enemies and gaining resources.

After a long period of development and testing, we believe that ‘Moonlight’ will bring you a brand new tower defense game experience.

In the game, we have designed five different types of weapons, including:

Rainbow Blaster: responsible for attacking and defeating enemies.
Stink Stick: responsible for slowing down enemies and releasing poison gas.
Frost Flyer: responsible for collecting energy.
Strawberry: although it cannot destroy enemies, it can cause permanent damage to them.
Sky Fortress: can launch trackers that make the attack power of other weapons double, which is a powerful tool for efficiently killing enemies.

The idea of the game is "You have to kill the enemy near the Frost Flyer to gain energy", which seems simple, but requires the right combination of each weapon to do it, which is very challenging.

Our development team has been working hard to improve this game. Prior to its release, we conducted extensive game testing to make necessary improvements and adjustments to enhance the game’s quality and fun.

We firmly believe that ‘Moonbeam’ is an outstanding tower defense game, and we hope players can try new challenges and stories and enjoy new game experiences through this game.

Thank you for your support!
